titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Office and Professional Employees International Union, Local 8 Records
Office and Professional Employees International Union

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Lew Guenther 2005

repository.corpname: University of Washington Libraries Special Collections

origination.corpname: Office and Professional Employees International Union.$bLocal 8 (Seattle, Wash.)

did.unittitle: Office and Professional Employees International Union, Local 8 records
did.abstract: Organizational records of a local union that represents over 4,000 members in health care, social services, insurance and office settings throughout Washington state

bioghist.p: Local 8 represents clerical and office workers of a wide variety of businesses around Puget Sound. Name of parent body changed from Office Employes International Union to Office and Professional Employees International Union in 1966.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, disputes and grievances, negotiations, contract files, election files, case files, organizaing files, membership records, financial records, chronological files, legal documents, minutes, reports, convention files, newsletters, subject files, ephemera.

accessrestrict.p: Open to all users, but access to portions of the papers restricted. Contact repository for details.

userestrict.p: Restrictions may exist on copying, quotation, or publication. Contact University of Washington Libraries Special Collections for details.

did.unittitle: Office and Professional Employees International Union, Local 8 Records

scopecontent.p: Membership records, miscellaneous correspondence, contract negotiations, financial records, grievance files, and related records, 1976-1986.
Includes records of the Sea-Land trial (1979), Sea-Land strike and trial (1982-1983), and correspondence and other documentation on an internal leadership dispute (1984-1985).

phystech.p: Records stored offsite; advance notice required for use.

accessrestrict.p: Open to all users, but access to portions of the papers restricted. Contact repository for details.
